name: MCNearbyServiceBrowser
desc: Searches (by service type) for services offered by nearby devices using infrastructure Wi-Fi, peer-to-peer Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth (in iOS) or Ethernet (in macOS and tvOS), and provides the ability to easily invite those devices to a Multipeer Connectivity session (MCSession).

items.name: init(peer: MCPeerID, serviceType: String)
items.desc: Initializes the nearby service browser object.

items.name: var delegate: MCNearbyServiceBrowserDelegate?
items.desc: The delegate object that handles browser-related events.

items.name: var myPeerID: MCPeerID
items.desc: The local peer ID for this instance.

items.name: var serviceType: String
items.desc: The service type to browse for.

items.name: func invitePeer(MCPeerID, to: MCSession, withContext: Data?, timeout: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Invites a discovered peer to join a Multipeer Connectivity session.
